Agent.name: Agent
Agent.description: AI Smartphone. +2 Library Search, +2 Wardrobe & Style depending on circumstance.

Audio Recorder.name: Audio Recorder
Audio Recorder.description: Record 24h of audio on a memory Chip.

Black Lace.name: Black Lace
Black Lace.description:
Dose lasts 24 hours.
The user rolls 2d6 Humanity Loss and loses this temporarily while affected. The user ignores Seriously Wounded wound states for the duration.

Secondary DV:17.
When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV. If this fails, they take the secondary effect as noted in the core rule book.

Blue Glass.name: Blue Glass
Blue Glass.description:
Dose lasts 4 hours.
The GM may occasionally tell the user that they are seeing swirls of colours. When this happens the user loses their action on a single turn.

Secondary DV: 15.
When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV. If this fails, they take the secondary effect as noted in the core rule book.

Boost.name: Boost
Boost.description:
Dose lasts 24 hours.
The user has increased INT by 2 points for the duration.

Secondary DV: 17.
When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV. If this fails, they take the secondary effect as noted in the core rule book.

Cryopump.name: Cryopump
Cryopump.description: Briefcase used for hooking up a wounded person. Places them in stasis.

Cryotank.name: Cryotank
Cryotank.description: Holds a fully-sized human, heals injuries faster than normal.

Cyberdeck.name: Cyberdeck
Cyberdeck.description: Netrunner deck. 7 slots.

Drum Synthesizer.name: Drum Synthesizer
Drum Synthesizer.description: Makes drum sounds when connected to amplifier.

Electric Guitar/Other Instrument.name: Electric Guitar/Other Instrument
Electric Guitar/Other Instrument.description: Musical instrument. Electric instruments require an amplifier.

Excellent Quality Cyberdeck.name: Excellent Quality Cyberdeck
Excellent Quality Cyberdeck.description: Netrunner deck. 9 slots.

Flashlight.name: Flashlight
Flashlight.description: 10h of light on a single charge. 100m/yd range.

Linear Frame β (Beta).name: Linear Frame β (Beta)
Linear Frame β (Beta).description: Exoesqueleto. Requer 2 plugs de interface. Aumenta o BODY para 14. Não altera o seu PV ou Salva de Morte.

Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).name: Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma)
Linear Frame ∑ (Sigma).description: Exoesqueleto. Requer 1 plug de interface. Aumenta o BODY para 12. Não altera o seu PV ou Salva de Morte.

Poor Quality Cyberdeck.name: Poor Quality Cyberdeck
Poor Quality Cyberdeck.description: Netrunner deck. 5 slots.

Smash.name: Smash
Smash.description:
Dose lasts 4 hours.
The user feels happy and satisfied, receiving a temporary modifier of +2 to: Dance/Contortionist/Conversation/Human Perception/Persuasion/Acting.

Secondary DV: 15.
When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV. If this fails, they take the secondary effect as noted in the core rule book.

Synthcoke.name: Synthcoke
Synthcoke.description:
Dose lasts 4 hours.
The user has increased REF by 1 point for the duration. The user feels paranoid occasionally.

Secondary DV: 15.
When the dose wears off, the user rolls WILL + Resist Torture/Drugs + 1d10 against Secondary DV. If this fails, they take the secondary effect as noted in the core rule book.

Vial of Biotoxin.name: Vial of Biotoxin
Vial of Biotoxin.description: 3d6 damage unless Resist Torture/Drugs. Armor does not apply.

Vial of Poison.name: Vial of Poison
Vial of Poison.description: 2d6 damage unless Resist Torture/Drugs. Armor does not apply.
